topic: Comprehensive characterization and comparison of active sites in Fe3Ni1/CeO2 and Fe1Ni3/CeO2 catalysts using advanced in situ and ex situ analytical techniques to elucidate their structural, chemical, and morphological properties at atomic and nanoscale levels.
QuestionEnglish: How do advanced in situ and ex situ analytical techniques, including XRD, XANES, EXAFS, and ADF-STEM with EELS, synergistically contribute to our understanding of the structural properties, oxidation states, spatial distribution, and morphological characteristics of active sites in Fe3Ni1/CeO2 and Fe1Ni3/CeO2 catalysts, and what are the key differences and implications of these findings for catalyst performance and design?
QuestionChinese: 先进的原位和非原位分析技术，包括XRD、XANES、EXAFS和ADF-STEM与EELS，如何协同地帮助我们理解Fe3Ni1/CeO2和Fe1Ni3/CeO2催化剂中活性位点的结构特性、氧化态、空间分布和形态特征，这些发现的主要差异和对催化剂性能与设计的影响是什么？
